author: cziegeler
msg: Commandline interface: the user-agent is now correctly set in the request headers (and not in the request parameters).

author: ruchithf
msg: Fixing http-server script to work on variable number of args
This usage is now supported : sh http-server.sh /path/to/repo -p 9090

author: ajith
msg: 1. A compromise for the issue 655. Now there is an option -ssi to indicate whether to generate an interface for the client side or not. If this is omitted then it will be just the normal style with concrete skeleton.
2. Fixed a minor issue in ADBBeanTemplate.xsl

author: smorgrav
msg: Fix bug in validScmUrl() and extend repository to handle sftp and https urls
- enable external authentication information (from super class)
- add unit tests for the parser
- add file protocol to the test url (explicit protocol now required)
